database-query.insert: INSERT INTO TEST_CRUD2 ( CNUMBER5_2, CDATE, CTIMESTAMP, CVARCHAR5_NN, CNUMBER5_2_NN, CDATE_NN, CTIMESTAMP_NN, TESTDATA ) VALUES ( $row.values.CNUMBER5_2, $row.values.CDATE, SYSDATE, $row.values.CVARCHAR5_NN, $row.values.CNUMBER5_2_NN, $row.values.CDATE_NN, SYSDATE, $row.values.TESTDATA )
database-query.update: UPDATE TEST_CRUD2 SET CNUMBER5_2 = $row.values.CNUMBER5_2, CDATE = $row.values.CDATE, CVARCHAR5_NN = $row.values.CVARCHAR5_NN, CNUMBER5_2_NN = $row.values.CNUMBER5_2_NN, CDATE_NN = $row.values.CDATE_NN, TESTDATA = $row.values.TESTDATA WHERE ID = $row.values.ID
